title: 5 Real-Life Use Cases of AI Agents for Day-to-Day Work
content:
AI agents are all set to become the next revolution in the GenAI Paradigm. The modern-day agent’s ability to harness AI to think and reason has enabled humans to truly automate routine tasks. The creation of AI agent frameworks and architectures like AutoGen, Crew AI, LangChain, etc, have come in handy in pushing the AI […]
The post 5 Real-Life Use Cases of AI Agents for Day-to-Day Work appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
author: Abhiraj Suresh
